name: manage-engine-log360
label: ManageEngine Log360
description: ManageEngine Log360 is a unified SIEM solution with integrated DLP and CASB capabilities that detects, prioritizes, investigates, and responds to security threats.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the URL of the ManageEngine Log360 server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the ManageEngine Log360 server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: token
fields.description: Specify the API key that is configured for your account to access the ManageEngine Log360 endpoint.
fields.tooltip: Specify the API key that is configured for your account to access the ManageEngine Log360 endpoint.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
